alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Meigs; Morgan; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 6:48PM CST until January 01 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Morgan County in east Tennessee... Northern Rhea County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Anderson County in east Tennessee... Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 845 PM EST. * At 747 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fairfield Glade to 8 miles north of Spring City to 14 miles south of Crossville to Pikeville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Ridge, Clinton, Kingston, Rockwood, Wartburg, Fairview, Oliver Springs, Spring City, Midtown and Harriman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 363. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 126 and 127. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
